data.title: Judith Dickinson Obituary - Orland Park, Illinois
data.meta_description: Judy passed away peacefully with her family beside her on August 3, 2016 at the age of 82.  Judy was preceded in death by her beloved husband of 47 years, John 'Jack' and her beloved sons Michael and David; her beloved parents Roberta and Maurice Ballatore and her cherished brother Ronald (Ann).  She is mourned by her beloved, adored, devoted daughter Krisanne (Kenneth) and by three loving, thoughtful, beloved grandsons, Dalton, Collin and Jackson; and by her dear brother Maurice (Joan).   Judy was surrounded by love throughout her life and will always be remembered as a loving, giving, devoted wife, mother, grandmother, daughter, sister, aunt, cousin and friend.    In keeping with Judy's wishes, private services have been held.  Express your thoughts and condolences at colonialchapel.com  708-532-5400
